channel.title: Pure-Scape 317 / 100% PVP / PVE
channel.description:
[b][center]Pure-Scape 317![/center][/b]
Features:
- Amazing Control Panel. - FULL GRAND EXCHANGE! (All important items working, Easy to add more via CFG file ). - FULL CastleWars! - FULL Bounty Hunter! - MySQL enabled (commented out at the moment, so you can enable). - Fully working SkillCape Emotes . - 90% Clan Chat, (Nothing missing that you will notice ). - FULLY Working Dueling. - 90% Working DUEL TOURNAMENTS! - FULLY Working Equipped Items Interface! (WITH Weight! Which effects your run energy! - ALL Skills work fully! - 100% working godwars - 95% working pots and sweets - Tons of train areas - Working jail, ban, unban, mute, unmute system! - All skills work! - Working dragonfire shield special - Quest tab teleports - Working trade - Working bank notes - 95% WORKING SPECIALS!!!! - PK POINT SYSTEM! - Rep System - Common Items Require Stats
Pictures: [img]http://i35.tinypic.com/1zfm0xv.jpg[/img] [img]http://i244.photobucket.com/albums/gg7/ktdude99/features.jpg[/img] [img]http://i244.photobucket.com/albums/gg7/ktdude99/hpbar.jpg[/img] [img]http://img184.imageshack.us/img184/8146/fubergen0017xs7.png[/img] [img]http://img378.imageshack.us/img378/8355/fubergen0018ry4.png[/img] [img]http://img291.imageshack.us/img291/8990/fubergen0020wg8.png[/img] [img]http://img67.imageshack.us/img67/3131/virusscanoc8.png[/img]
Source: Uppit:[url=http://uppit.com/v/80PFCPS7]http://uppit.com/v/80PFCPS7[/url] Megaupload: [url=http://www.megaupload.com/?d=OS93OK47]http://www.megaupload.com/?d=OS93OK47[/url]
